post.content:
MOST SOFTWARE ENGINEERS DON'T CARE ABOUT EQUITY!
Which is crazy because that's the absolute fastest path for them to get rich within their 20s and 30s.
So I built this long term compensation calculator to help people materialize what does it mean to meaningfully participate in building a multi-billion dollar business.
I built this over a busy afternoon in between calls using https://webdraw.ai

The results are amazing! This is literally pre-alpha software and I'm hooked, my email and whatsapp inbox is flooded (sorry!) because I want to webdraw all of the time and answer emails none of the time.

This is gonna be fun! Join us in the waitlist, ask around and you can get an invite! https://webdraw.ai
